Garden_Grove.Anaheim Regional Medical Center: Anaheim Regional Medical Center, formerly known as Anaheim Memorial Medical Center,  is a 228 bed, acute care hospital in North Anaheim, California. It opened its doors in 1958 and serves the greater North Anaheim, South Fullerton, La Habra and La Mirada areas. It was named one of the top 100 hospitals in the country for quality in the areas of heart attack care, heart failure care and pneumonia care.
